sourcesContent:
<template>
  <paginate
    :page-count=totalPages
    :page-range="3"
    :margin-pages="1"
    :click-handler="clickCallback"
    :prev-text="'Trước'"
    :next-text="'Sau'"
    :container-class="'pagination'"
    :page-class="'page-item'"
    :force-page="pageIndex"
    @click="clickMe"
  >
  </paginate>
</template>

<script>
import Paginate from 'vuejs-paginate-next';
  export default {
    components: {
      paginate: Paginate,
    },
    props: ["totalPages"],
     methods: {
      clickCallback(value){
        debugger
        console.log(value);
       this.$emit("pageNumber", value);
      },

    },
   data() {
     return {
       pageNumber: this.clickCallback()
     }
   },

  };
</script>

<style>
  /* Adopt bootstrap pagination stylesheet. */
  /* @import "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.1.3/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; */

  /* Write your own CSS for pagination */
  .pagination {
    list-style-type: none;
    display: flex;
  }

.page-item{
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  margin: 8px;
  text-align: center;
}

.page-item:focus{
 font-weight: 700;
  border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
}
.page-item-selected{
  font-weight: 700;
  border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
}

.page-item:first-child{
  border: none;
}

.page-item:last-child{
  border: none;
}

.page-item:hover{
 cursor: pointer;
}
</style>
